modName: Amulet of Homecoming - Playerhouse Teleporter and Recall
summary: Adds a Teleportamulet to the game that can be used to teleport to all vanilla-houses and also has a mark&recall function.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=5][color=\"#2E8B57\"]Amulet of Homecoming[/color][/size][/b][/center]

[center][b]Author:[/b] wallice[/center]
[center][b]Category:[/b] Item[/center]
[center][b] Language:[/b] English / optional German[/center]

v1.2: REQUIRES DAWNGUARD AND HEARTHFIRE! IF YOU DON\'T HAVE BOTH USE !.1!
* Hearthfire houses added, you have to build them first of course
* Castle Voikhar (Lord Harkon\'s Quarters) if \"Kindred Judgement\" is completed
* some other locations
* now you can set up to 3 own marks making it possible to recall to houses from mods

v1.1: Guilds added, you have to be a member of a guild to be able to teleport there

[center][size=4][color=\"#4169E1\"]Description:[/color][/size][/center]
The \'Amulet of Homecoming\' can teleport the player to all (vanilla)houses he owns and also has a \"return\" function, if used outside of any home it will remember the teleportlocation so you can return there later.

[center][size=4][color=\"#4169E1\"]How it works:[/color][/size][/center]
Pretty simple, just enter one of your homes to get the amulet automatically, also the amulet will know you own this house from this point. So if you\'ve multiple houses you have to enter them first to unleash the full power of the amulet. Eqipping it will giving you a message so you can choose where to teleport.

[center][size=4][color=\"#4169E1\"]Installation:[/color][/size][/center]
Use NMM or drop the *.esp and *.bsa into steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\data
Activate AmuletOfHomecoming.esp in your favorite launcher

[center][size=4][color=\"#4169E1\"]Deinstallation:[/color][/size][/center]
Simply Delete AmuletOfHomecoming.esp and AmuletOfHomecoming.bsa from your steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\data folder

[center][size=4][color=\"#4169E1\"]Compatibility:[/color][/size][/center]
Should\'nt conflict with other mods, nothing is changed/placed in the playerhomes, Scripts only check for one Vanillareference inside the homes.

[center][color=\"#2E8B57\"]Have fun![/color][/center]
author: wallice

files.name: Amulet of Homecoming 1_1
files.changelogHtml: Guild locations added: Thieves guild, Companions, Dark Brotherhood, College of Winterhold
